summary: Karen Bentley, an English secret agent, links up with Larry Haines and his star penguin Percy in an attempt to outwit German spies.
cast: Bob Hope|Madeleine Carroll|Gale Sondergaard|George Zucco|Lionel Royce|Walter Kingsford|Victor Varconi|Otto Reichow|Esther Howard|Edward Gargan|James Burke|Charles Cane|Crane Whitley|Dooley Wilson|Milton Parsons|Erville Alderson|Tom Fadden|Fred Kelsey|Edgar Dearing|Leslie Denison|Robert Emmett Keane|Addison Richards|Matthew Boulton|Mary Akin|Rose Allen|Monte Blue|Wade Boteler|William Cabanne|Jack Chapin|Jack Rube Clifford|Edmund Cobb|Nell Craig|Kernan Cripps|Bing Crosby|Vernon Dent|Eddie Dew|Dudley Dickerson|Jimmie Dodd|Pearl Early|Sarah Edwards|Dick Elliott|Johnny Erickson|Betty Farrington|James Ford|William Forrest|Arno Frey|Jack Gardner|Kirby Grant|Grace Hayle|Edward Hearn|Oscar 'Dutch' Hendrian|George Hickman|John Hiestand|Leyland Hodgson|Harry Hollingsworth|Alice Keating|Richard Keene|John Kelly|Phyllis Kennedy|Lyle Latell|Perc Launders|Teala Loring|Jack Luden|Charles McAvoy|Pat McKee|David McKim|Art Miles|James Millican|Frank Mills|Charles R. title: Mi rubia favorita
